main event: A sighting of unidentified aerial objects was reported near Randolph AFB, Texas on 12 June 1952, lasting for about 30 minutes.
interesting points: The objects appeared about three times as bright as Venus, four times as fast as an F-86 jet, and about one-twentieth the size of a full moon.
They were described as bright bluish-white in color and exhibited erratic movement patterns such as going back and forth, up and down, and suddenly appearing and disappearing.
The sighting was made from a drive-in theater by the Officer of the Physiology Branch of the Aero Medical Lab, WADC.
About 15 to 20 objects were observed, appearing one at a time and not fading out gradually.
The weather during the sighting was clear.
